skills.name: Surprise Variety Show
skills.desc: Regenerates Energy for a target. This ability can only be used while under the Surprise Channel state.

skills.name: Startling Broadcast
skills.desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the Fright Channel state.

skills.name: Channel Switch
skills.desc: Switches the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status.

skills.name: Channel Crossover
skills.desc: After being attacked, this unit will switch from the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status, or vice versa.
